layman_description: Controls how big or small the object looks in the game.
technical_description: A numeric multiplier that adjusts the entity's model scale value used by rendering and collision.
player_impact: Makes objects or creatures appear larger or smaller in the world.

layman_description: Specifies which sound plays repeatedly when the item is used.
technical_description: Holds the path/name of a looping sound asset to play repeatedly for the item.
player_impact: Causes a steady sound effect while the item is active or firing.

layman_description: How long a corpse remains before disappearing.
technical_description: Duration in seconds that the dead entity stays in the world before cleanup.
player_impact: Determines how long you can loot or interact with a dead body.

layman_description: The visual particle effect shown when a weapon fires.
technical_description: Specifies the particle effect name spawned at the weapon muzzle on firing.
player_impact: Changes the visual flash and effects seen when shooting.

layman_description: Toggles whether the item reloads automatically.
technical_description: Boolean setting that enables automatic reload behavior for the item.
player_impact: If true, the item reloads itself without manual action.

layman_description: Whether creatures can appear on this block.
technical_description: Boolean flag controlling if AI entities are allowed to spawn on the block.
player_impact: Controls whether monsters or animals can spawn on that surface.

layman_description: Shows a crosshair when you aim with this item.
technical_description: Boolean that enables displaying a crosshair while aiming with the item.
player_impact: Gives a visible aiming aid when using the item.

layman_description: How many blocks around an explosion are affected.
technical_description: Numeric radius, in blocks, defining the area of block damage from an explosion value.
player_impact: Larger values cause broader structural destruction.

layman_description: Changes how the item hits targets.
technical_description: Overrides the default hitmask with a specified hit type like Arrow or Melee.
player_impact: Alters which hit detection rules apply during attacks.

layman_description: Selects which particle effect to use for the block.
technical_description: Integer index pointing to a particle entry used by the block.
player_impact: Determines which visual particle is shown during effects.

layman_description: Defines the block radius for an effect or action.
technical_description: Numeric radius in blocks used by block-related effects or behaviors.
player_impact: Affects how many blocks are impacted by the effect.

layman_description: Defines how far entities are affected by something.
technical_description: Numeric radius, in world units, specifying the range of entity effects.
player_impact: Controls which nearby creatures or players are influenced.

layman_description: Maximum zoom level when looking in with the item.
technical_description: Numeric value representing the closest zoom/in magnification allowed for the item.
player_impact: Affects how much you can zoom in for precise aiming.

layman_description: Maximum zoom level when looking out with the item.
technical_description: Numeric value representing the furthest zoom/out magnification allowed for the item.
player_impact: Affects how wide or distant your view can be while aiming.

layman_description: Which rotations are allowed when placing the block.
technical_description: Enumerated setting that restricts block rotation options (e.g., No45, Basic90, All).
player_impact: Limits how you can rotate the block when placing it.

layman_description: Whether players can spawn on this block.
technical_description: Boolean flag controlling if player spawnpoints can be located on the block.
player_impact: Determines if the block can serve as a spawn location.

layman_description: How far an explosion affects living things.
technical_description: Numeric radius, in units, that determines which entities take explosion effects.
player_impact: Sets how many creatures or players are hurt by explosion blasts.

layman_description: Specifies the physics model used for the entity's movement.
technical_description: Reference name for the physics body profile applied to the entity's 3D shape and motion.
player_impact: Changes how the creature or object moves and collides.

layman_description: A named modification or upgrade for the vehicle.
technical_description: String key identifying a vehicle mod type such as speed, light, or storage.
player_impact: Applies a functional upgrade to the vehicle's performance or features.

layman_description: Whether replacements occur randomly for this block.
technical_description: Boolean flag that enables random replacement selection for the block.
player_impact: Determines if the block will be swapped with a random variant.

layman_description: Controls how bright the block is.
technical_description: Numeric intensity value used for block lighting effects.
player_impact: Affects the brightness emitted around the block.

layman_description: Type or path used to describe available vehicle mods.
technical_description: String path or identifier listing specific mod entries used by vehicles.
player_impact: Defines which mod options are available for that vehicle.

layman_description: Whether the block can be picked up into your inventory.
technical_description: Boolean setting indicating if the block is removable and storable in inventory.
player_impact: If true, players can pick the block up and carry it.

layman_description: How much damage an explosion does to living targets.
technical_description: Numeric damage value applied to entities within an explosion event.
player_impact: Higher values increase harm to creatures and players.

layman_description: How fertile a block is for plant growth.
technical_description: Integer fertile level threshold used by plant growth logic.
player_impact: Affects crop success and growth speed.

layman_description: Indicates how hard a quest is.
technical_description: Numeric tier value representing quest difficulty level used by progression systems.
player_impact: Higher tiers mean more challenging quest objectives.

layman_description: The identifier for the reward or offer from a quest.
technical_description: String key mapping to a specific offer entry granted by a quest.
player_impact: Determines which reward is given when the quest completes.

layman_description: Amount of structural damage an explosion causes to blocks.
technical_description: Numeric damage value applied to nearby blocks when an explosion occurs.
player_impact: Larger values break more or stronger blocks.

layman_description: How fast the creature moves normally.
technical_description: Numeric movement speed multiplier used by the entity's navigation logic.
player_impact: Changes how quickly creatures approach or flee.

layman_description: How much cloth you get from breaking this block.
technical_description: Integer yield value indicating cloth resource returned from the block.
player_impact: Affects how much crafting material you collect.

layman_description: Identifier for the quest response message.
technical_description: String key used to look up the response text or action for a quest.
player_impact: Determines the message or follow-up shown when the quest updates.

layman_description: Identifier for the quest description or instruction.
technical_description: String key that maps to the quest statement text displayed to players.
player_impact: Controls the objective text players see for the quest.

layman_description: Specifies facial hair options for an item or character.
technical_description: Named mask type controlling facial hair visuals applied to the entity's model.
player_impact: Affects the character or NPC appearance details.

layman_description: Whether this block ignores being turned off by lighting controls.
technical_description: Boolean flag that prevents light-off logic from disabling the block's light source.
player_impact: Ensures the light remains on even when global settings try to turn it off.

layman_description: Sound played when you enter aiming mode with the item.
technical_description: Named sound entry triggered when entering the item's sight-in state.
player_impact: Provides an audio cue when you begin aiming.

layman_description: Sound played when you exit aiming mode with the item.
technical_description: Named sound entry triggered when leaving the item's sight-in state.
player_impact: Plays an audio cue when you stop aiming.

layman_description: Defines the group type that can spawn at this block.
technical_description: String identifier for the spawn group used by the block's spawn logic.
player_impact: Controls which animals or monsters appear in that area.

layman_description: Whether the block is destroyed when a specific event occurs.
technical_description: Boolean flag that triggers block removal upon the linked event.
player_impact: Makes the block disappear when the event happens.

layman_description: Which picture/icon shows on the in-game map for this entity.
technical_description: String key pointing to a map picture/icon asset used to mark the entity on the map.
player_impact: Changes the icon players see for the entity on the map.

layman_description: Additional tags attached to the quest for filtering or behavior.
technical_description: Comma-separated list of tag strings used to modify quest handling or categorization.
player_impact: Can alter how quests are grouped or trigger special behaviors.

layman_description: Vibration or effect triggered on DualSense controllers when firing.
technical_description: Named effect key used to trigger DualSense haptics on shoot events.
player_impact: Provides controller vibration feedback when the weapon fires.

layman_description: Controller effect triggered on Xbox controllers when firing.
technical_description: Named effect key used to trigger Xbox controller feedback on shoot events.
player_impact: Gives controller vibration feedback during shooting.

layman_description: Primary AI behavior task assigned to the entity.
technical_description: First entry in the AI task list specifying a behavior module like RunawayWhenHurt or BreakBlock.
player_impact: Determines a key behavior the creature will perform.

layman_description: Which controller logic the entity uses for animation and movement.
technical_description: String identifier for the avatar controller type applied to the entity's motion and animation systems.
player_impact: Alters how the entity animates and responds to movement rules.

layman_description: Whether the entity uses a physics ragdoll when dead.
technical_description: Boolean toggle that enables ragdoll physics on entity death.
player_impact: If true, bodies collapse with physics-based motion after death.

layman_description: Brightness value used for the item's light emission.
technical_description: Numeric intensity setting used by the item's light source logic.
player_impact: Adjusts how much light the item emits when active.

layman_description: Indicates whether multiple model parts are combined into one asset.
technical_description: Boolean setting that marks the entity as using a combined model asset for runtime efficiency.
player_impact: May affect loading or how the object appears in-game.

layman_description: Specifies the quest granted by using or finding this item.
technical_description: String key identifying a quest that this item grants or starts when used.
player_impact: Using the item can start or assign a specific quest.

layman_description: A looping sound that plays while the item is active.
technical_description: Named sound asset that is continuously played while the item is in its active state.
player_impact: Creates ongoing audio while the item runs.

layman_description: Which butchering tool category this item falls into.
technical_description: Numeric category value mapping the item to a butcher tool class used by crafting or tool checks.
player_impact: Determines behavior or recipes that require a butcher tool.

layman_description: How far away the block can be activated from.
technical_description: Numeric distance in units that defines the activation range for the block.
player_impact: Controls how close a player must be to trigger the block.

layman_description: The 3D shape that appears in your hands when you hold this item.
technical_description: Specifies the mesh model file used for the first-person hand-held item display.
player_impact: Determines what the item looks like when you're holding it in your hands.

layman_description: This weapon never runs out of ammunition.
technical_description: Enables unlimited ammunition for the weapon without consuming ammo from inventory.
player_impact: You can fire this weapon endlessly without needing to find or craft ammo.

layman_description: This item produces light when activated.
technical_description: Assigns a lighting configuration to the item when active.
player_impact: Illuminates dark areas around you when you turn it on.

layman_description: The sound that plays when you try to open a locked door or gate.
technical_description: Specifies the audio file played when a player interacts with a locked block.
player_impact: Provides audio feedback that tells you the door or gate is locked.

layman_description: The type of material this creature is made of for sound and damage effects.
technical_description: Defines the material type used for hit reactions and footstep audio.
player_impact: Affects what sounds play when you hit or walk near this creature.

layman_description: The icon that appears on your compass when tracking this animal.
technical_description: Specifies the icon displayed in the tracking interface for this creature.
player_impact: Helps you identify and locate this specific animal on your compass when tracking.

layman_description: The trigger feedback effect on PlayStation 5 controllers when firing.
technical_description: Defines the haptic trigger resistance pattern for DualSense controllers when shooting.
player_impact: Makes the controller trigger feel different when you fire, adding realism on PS5.

layman_description: How much zombies prefer or avoid walking through this area.
technical_description: Scaling factor for AI pathfinding cost through different terrain types.
player_impact: Affects whether zombies will walk through certain areas or go around them.

layman_description: The first behavior rule that controls what this creature attacks.
technical_description: Primary targeting behavior instruction for the creature's AI decision tree.
player_impact: Determines when and what this creature will consider as a threat to attack.

layman_description: The part of the item that turns on when you activate it.
technical_description: Specifies which game object becomes active when the item is toggled on.
player_impact: Controls which part of the item lights up or activates when you use it.

layman_description: The kind of injury this weapon inflicts on enemies.
technical_description: Classifies the damage category for armor calculations and resistances.
player_impact: Different damage types work better against certain armor and enemies.

layman_description: How many seconds it takes to reload this weapon.
technical_description: Duration in seconds for the weapon reload animation and action.
player_impact: Determines how long you're vulnerable while reloading during combat.

layman_description: How much electricity this device needs to operate.
technical_description: The power consumption value required from electrical sources.
player_impact: You need to generate this much power to run this device.

layman_description: The trigger vibration feedback when firing on Xbox controllers.
technical_description: Defines the impulse trigger rumble pattern for Xbox controllers when shooting.
player_impact: Makes the controller trigger rumble when you fire, adding realism on Xbox.

layman_description: How much damage a corpse can take before it disappears.
technical_description: The health pool assigned to a creature's corpse after death.
player_impact: Determines how many times you can harvest or hit a body before it's destroyed.

layman_description: Extra damage this explosion does to dirt and soil blocks.
technical_description: Damage multiplier applied when explosion hits terrain blocks.
player_impact: Affects how effectively explosions can dig through dirt and create craters.

layman_description: How fast this creature runs when scared or fleeing.
technical_description: Movement speed multiplier applied during panic behavior state.
player_impact: Determines how quickly animals or zombies run away when frightened.

layman_description: This block faces a random direction when you place it down.
technical_description: Enables random rotation selection when the block is placed in the world.
player_impact: Adds variety by automatically rotating blocks like furniture when placed.

layman_description: How your view shifts when you aim down the sights on this weapon.
technical_description: Camera position offset applied when entering aim-down-sights mode.
player_impact: Changes your viewing angle slightly when you aim for precise shooting.

layman_description: How long after stepping on a trap before it activates.
technical_description: Delay in seconds between trap activation and effect execution.
player_impact: Gives you a brief moment to escape after triggering a trap.

layman_description: The sound that plays when you step on or activate a trap.
technical_description: Specifies the audio file played when the trap is triggered.
player_impact: Warns you that you've activated a trap before it goes off.

layman_description: What special event happens when you activate this block.
technical_description: Specifies which scripted event to execute upon block activation.
player_impact: Can teleport you, spawn enemies, or trigger other effects when activated.

layman_description: Where you appear when you get out of this vehicle.
technical_description: Defines the spawn position coordinates relative to the vehicle when exiting.
player_impact: Controls where your character stands after leaving the vehicle.

layman_description: This quest resets its rally marker when you log back into the game.
technical_description: Forces quest rally point to reset upon player login.
player_impact: Quest waypoint updates to a new location each time you start playing.

layman_description: Where you sit inside the vehicle.
technical_description: Defines the seat position coordinates within the vehicle model.
player_impact: Determines your viewpoint and location when riding in the vehicle.

layman_description: The angle at which you're rotated while sitting in this vehicle seat.
technical_description: Specifies the orientation angles for the player in the vehicle seat.
player_impact: Affects the direction you face when seated in the vehicle.

layman_description: Whether you can give this quest to other players in your group.
technical_description: Enables quest sharing functionality in multiplayer sessions.
player_impact: Allows party members to receive and complete the same quest together.

layman_description: The second behavior pattern this creature follows during gameplay.
technical_description: Secondary AI task instruction in the creature's behavior priority list.
player_impact: Controls what action the creature takes after completing its primary task.

layman_description: The third behavior pattern this creature follows during gameplay.
technical_description: Tertiary AI task instruction in the creature's behavior priority list.
player_impact: Determines the creature's third priority action in its decision-making.

layman_description: The fourth behavior pattern this creature follows during gameplay.
technical_description: Quaternary AI task instruction in the creature's behavior priority list.
player_impact: Controls what the creature does when all higher priority tasks are complete.

layman_description: What modifications can be attached to this item.
technical_description: Specifies which attachment items are compatible with this equipment.
player_impact: Determines what upgrades like flashlights or scopes you can add.

layman_description: Where projectiles come from when you fire this weapon.
technical_description: Position offset for the projectile spawn point relative to the weapon model.
player_impact: Adjusts where bullets or arrows appear to come from the weapon.

layman_description: Extra damage this explosion does to water blocks.
technical_description: Damage multiplier applied when explosion hits water terrain.
player_impact: Affects how well explosions can destroy water sources or wet areas.

layman_description: How quickly this thrown item falls to the ground.
technical_description: Gravitational acceleration value applied to projectile physics.
player_impact: Controls the arc and drop of thrown weapons like spears or grenades.

layman_description: How long it takes to smelt one unit of this material in a forge.
technical_description: Duration in seconds required to process one unit in smelting operations.
player_impact: Determines how quickly you can turn ore or materials into usable resources.

layman_description: How your view shifts when looking through a scope on this weapon.
technical_description: Camera position adjustment applied when using scoped aiming mode.
player_impact: Aligns your view properly with the scope's crosshairs for accurate shooting.

layman_description: How far to the side your view is positioned when holding this item.
technical_description: Horizontal camera offset applied during item usage.
player_impact: Adjusts the side-to-side positioning of your view with this item.

layman_description: The sitting or riding position animation you use in this vehicle seat.
technical_description: Animation pose identifier for the player in the vehicle seat.
player_impact: Determines how your character looks while sitting in the vehicle.

layman_description: How much engine power versus braking force this vehicle has.
technical_description: Ratio of motor torque to brake torque for vehicle wheel control.
player_impact: Affects acceleration speed and stopping power when driving.

layman_description: The part of the vehicle model this setting applies to.
technical_description: Specifies the target transform node in the vehicle model hierarchy.
player_impact: Identifies which vehicle part is affected by associated settings.

layman_description: The flashlight attachment that can be added to this weapon.
technical_description: Specifies the flashlight modification item compatible with this weapon.
player_impact: Allows you to add a light source to see in dark areas while armed.

layman_description: The category tags that describe what type of creature this is.
technical_description: Classification flags used for targeting, AI, and system behavior.
player_impact: Determines how perks, skills, and other game systems treat this creature.

layman_description: How long this thrown or placed item lasts before disappearing.
technical_description: Duration in seconds before the spawned entity is automatically removed.
player_impact: Controls how long effects like torches or flares stay in the world.

layman_description: Which animation pose this interactive block uses.
technical_description: Animation state identifier for the block's active configuration.
player_impact: Determines what the block looks like in different states like open or closed.

layman_description: How much brass scrap you get from scrapping or destroying this object.
technical_description: Quantity of brass scrap resource awarded upon block destruction.
player_impact: Determines how much brass material you receive for salvaging this item.

layman_description: The second targeting rule that controls what this creature attacks.
technical_description: Secondary targeting behavior instruction for the creature's AI system.
player_impact: Determines alternative targets the creature will consider attacking.

layman_description: The third targeting rule that controls what this creature attacks.
technical_description: Tertiary targeting behavior instruction for the creature's AI system.
player_impact: Provides additional options for what the creature will select as targets.

layman_description: The fourth targeting rule that controls what this creature attacks.
technical_description: Quaternary targeting behavior instruction for the creature's AI system.
player_impact: Offers the lowest priority targeting options for creature decision-making.

layman_description: How much injury you take from falling onto this block surface.
technical_description: Damage multiplier applied when a player lands on this block type.
player_impact: Some surfaces like hay hurt less than concrete when you fall on them.
